title: Good value for price the area is so-so
text: Rooms were very nice and clean, free parking (though limited capacity), basic-only breakfast (in-room only), 10 minutes walk to Union square, 10 minutes walk to California cable car line. I did not like the area of the motel: many homeless, some are bothering. Overall I'd recommend this place, though I may look for another one, better located, next time.
